comments_since_last_sample.body: Listening to JK sing this literally brought me to tears. It's so beautiful.

hope u reacting more about him !!! especially his covers, or another bts album :)))) i want u to react more of bts but not just the recent stuff plsss u wont regret bc they have a long road, and every year of them is different, every work, every song... <3
little mix and Jungkook really took this song to new levels of amazing. their covers ruined the original for me. i can only listen to their versions
